meanings.definition: A reddish variety of chalcedony used as a gemstone.
meanings.sent1: She admired the beautiful carnelians in the jewelry store.
meanings.sent2: The carnelians sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.
meanings.sent3: The carnelians seemed to whisper secrets to each other in the display case.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bright as a string of carnelians around her neck.
meanings.sent5: The carnelians glowed like drops of sunset trapped in stone.

meanings.sent1: The carnelians bracelet matched her dress perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The carnelians hues added warmth to the room.
meanings.sent3: The carnelians charm seemed to bring good luck wherever it went.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as bright and smooth as polished carnelians.
meanings.sent5: The carnelians glow made the whole room feel cozy and inviting.
